column4: I wonder if Resbaloso realizes his bash shell was written by a black man, o well.
i work with the author of the bash shell, smart dude
cool, I once gave a talk about the innerworkings of dhcp, not knowing that one of the rfc authors was at the conference table!
heh... I was trying to tell the author of bash about a cool bash feature and he said, "You have no idea, do you."
